name: SKAdImpression
desc: A class that defines an ad impression for a view-through ad.

items.name: var signature: String
items.desc: The advertising network’s cryptographic signature for the ad impression.

items.name: var version: String
items.desc: The version of the SKAdNetwork API.

items.name: var adNetworkIdentifier: String
items.desc: A string that represents the advertising network’s unique identifier.

items.name: var adCampaignIdentifier: NSNumber
items.desc: A number that represents the advertising network’s campaign.

items.name: var advertisedAppStoreItemIdentifier: NSNumber
items.desc: The App Store ID of the app that this ad impression advertises.

items.name: var adImpressionIdentifier: String
items.desc: A random value used for added security.

items.name: var sourceAppStoreItemIdentifier: NSNumber
items.desc: The App Store ID of the app that displays the ad.

items.name: var timestamp: NSNumber
items.desc: A number that represents the timestamp of the ad impression.

items.name: var adDescription: String?
items.desc: A human-readable description of the ad.

items.name: var adPurchaserName: String?
items.desc: The name of the entity that purchased the ad.
